com.ibm.ccl.soa.deploy.core
Interface UnitLink

All Superinterfaces:
DeployLink, DeployModelObject
All Known Subinterfaces:
HostingLink, MemberLink
public interface UnitLink
extends DeployLink

A representation of the model object 'Unit Link'. A generic binding of a Unit to another Unit.

Unit links are binary relationships. In the programming interface they are created by CoreFactory.createUnitLink(). In the user interface, they cannot be directly instantiated. Instead, users instantiate one of their two core subtypes: HostingLink or MemberLink.

Users may extend UnitLink to provide new kinds of unit to unit relationships. In such cases, the domain implementation of the abstract domain matcher DomainMatcher must be extended to return link descriptors that generate the subtype instance.

The endpoints of unit links are serialized as topology paths obtained using DeployModelObject.getFullPath(). In the first release of the Topology Definition Model (TDM), the source of the unit link is the containing unit DeployModelObject.getParent(). In future versions, unit links may be contained in an object that is different from the source, so users should use getSource() to obtain the requirement, rather than casting the result of DeployModelObject.getParent().

.

See Also:
CorePackage.getUnitLink()
